title: YOHOM 2Pcs Vacuum Suction Cup Hooks Holder Stick to Window Smooth Wall Shower Kitchen Bathroom Towel Hanging Hook Organizer for Towel Bathrobe and Loofah,Hooks No Drill,Brushed Silver
features: These suction towel holder are made of premium grade stainless steel, while the suction cup is made of PVC (with STICKY back for your easily placement). Brushed stainless steel suction shower hooks protect against corrosion & rust.

Yohom suction towel hooks only work on smooth clean dry flat and non-porous surface, such as glass, window, mirror, porcelain tile, glazed tile, acrylic, stainless steel, plastic surface, corian walls etc. Doesn’t work on dusty, wet, breathable, uneven, porous, painted, matte, textured or curved surfaces such as PAINTED WALL, CERAMIC, Original WOOD, Natural Marble, Natural Granite, Mosaic or Travertine tiles, Plastered Wall, Lime Wall, Wallpaper, Frosted Glass, over Grout Lines etc.

With the maximum loading of 5kg, suction bathroom hook has the advantages of economic, practical, contemporary style, dampproof, waterproof and repeatedly used. Strong suction cup can prevent slipping.

Follow the instruction to install suction hooks for bathroom carefully. Press suction cup towel hook firmly to the wall and rotate the knob cap by hands to complete the installation and removal of sucker hooks, while enhancing the beauty of your kitchen and bathroom. Yohom suction hook is convenient, no drilling, no screws.

Dimensions of suction cup hooks heavy duty: 6.5 x 6.5 x 5.5cm, thickness of hook:16mm. Shower towel hook is ideal for hanging your towels, loofahs, body brushes, clothes, hat, keys, bags, jackets and so on.
description: Product Description YOHOM Heavy Duty Hooks with Suction Cup Specifications Material: Stainless Steel Finish: Brushed Finish Suggest max load: 5KG/11lb Package Contains Stainless steel powerful vacuum suction cup hooks*2 Attention Points Please confirm if your wall is suitable for installation. Only smooth and flat wall can keep the suction cup in a vacuum sealed state. There’s an installation instruction coming along in the package box. It’s helpful for a successful installation and long-term vacuum. How to Install 1. Please clean and dry the expected place before install, make sure the bottom of suction cup is clean. 2. To make sure it is in pre-installed state, please gently twist the knob cap in an Anti-clockwise manner until can not rotate. 3. Push the suction cup perpendicularly into the expected place, push firmly on the stud/hanger shaft and turn the knob cover by hand to release air. ( At first installation, please remove the protective cover ) 4. Keep pressing the centre firmly, spin lock to the right until hear a "click" and feel a substantial lock of the locking suction. Then pull the suction cup left and right for testing. Utility Hooks Shower Washcloth Holder Characteristics of YOHOM Suction Holder A 2-mm layer of soft and sticky gum combines with high plastic PVC. Easier and more flexible to fill in 1-2mm uneven surface, remain the strongest vacuum. No mark left by the sticky base. High-plastic rubber inside ensures non-breaking when twist and lock, even if you relocate it couple of times or after a long time.
